text: Andrew John Leonard Fletcher (8 July 1961 - 26 May 2022), sometimes known as Fletch, was an English keyboard player, DJ, and a founding member of the electronic band Depeche Mode. In 2020, Fletcher was honored into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. Fletcher's death was announced on 26 May 2022. He was aged 60. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English rock musicians Category:British DJs Category:British keyboardists Category:Musicians from Nottinghamshire Category:People from Nottingham Category:Depeche Mode members
title: Andy Fletcher (musician)
